MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G46 postcode area of Thornliebank. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:06pm due to a safety concern with the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:10 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
